name: Alfie Deyes
controversy_summary: Made a vlog about surviving on one pound for a day. The video was percieved as insensitive and there was significant backlash in the community and in mainstream media.

name: Deji
controversy_summary: Part of an ongoing controversy with his brother. In this incident, there was an altercation during Christmas dinner and police were involved.

name: Keemstar
controversy_summary: Started with Keemstar making and incorrect statement on his "news" show and snowballed into a series of vloggers making "exposed" videos about his character and statements from the past.

name: Fine Bros
controversy_summary: Attempted to copywrite and take ownership of the format of reaction videos. This sparked a massive conversation in the community around copywriting and ownership of content.

name: Gabriel Zamora
controversy_summary: During his feud with Jeffree Star, past racist tweets emerged. He made a video apologizing for his remarks and his behaviour towards Jeffree.

name: Grav3yardgirl
controversy_summary: Made a rant video in which she was very frustrated about not getting a free refill at Starbucks.

name: H3H3
controversy_summary: During the WSJ and Pewdiepie controversy, they claimed that certain screenshots taken by the WSJ were fake. An apology video was made soon after once the original reasons for not believing the screenshots were debunked.

name: Jaclyn Hill
controversy_summary: She launched new lipsticks that had several quality issues and were unusable in a large proportion of cases.

name: James Charles
controversy_summary: Tati Westbrook accused Charles of being a bad friend and a sexual predator seeking straight men.

name: Jeffree Star
controversy_summary: A history of derogatory and racist comments from 10 years prior.

name: Jenna Marbles
controversy_summary: Improper care of her new fish.

name: Jon Tron
controversy_summary: On a debate with another vlogger, Jon made several insensitive and inflammatory comments.

name: KSI
controversy_summary: On-going beef with his brother. This was an apology/response to the last video put out by Deji.

name: Laura Lee
controversy_summary: During her feud with Jeffree Star, past racist tweets emerged.

name: Leafy
controversy_summary: Following an episode of content cop made by iDubzzz, a series of YouTubers started making videos exposing Leafy's behavior and bullying online.

name: Logan Paul
controversy_summary: Filmed a dead body in a Japanese forest and added it to a vlog.

name: Louis Cole
controversy_summary: Made a series of vlogs in North Korea that were percieved as being propagandistic.

name: Maximilian Dood
controversy_summary: Used a racial slur during a livestream and responded right after the stream ended.

name: Olivia Jade
controversy_summary: Said in a vlog that she was not attending college for academics and just wanted to focus on YouTube and attend parties at school. (Incidentally, she was involved in the recent scandal at USC)

name: Onision
controversy_summary: One in a pattern of controversies stirred up by Onision to increase viewership. He made a video about breast augmentation surgery skewed to attack Jaclyn Glenn.

name: PewDiePie
controversy_summary: He used a racial slur during a livestream.

name: RiceGum
controversy_summary: Promoted a mystery box gambling website to his young audience.

name: Shay Carl
controversy_summary: Evidence of adultery was released on Twitter.

name: Tana
controversy_summary: idubzzz brought up a history of racist comments by Tana.

name: LaBrant Fam
controversy_summary: Made a prank video on their daughter in which they said they were going to give her dog away.

name: Zoella
controversy_summary: Created and promoted an overpriced advent calendar marketed to young kids.

name: Jake Paul
controversy_summary: Made a diss track about his brother which caused a lot of controversy among fans.

name: Social Repose
controversy_summary: Cheated on another YouTuber, Jaclyn Glen, and she made a video about the situation.

name: Brad Sousa
controversy_summary: Cheated on YouTuber Tana.

name: TmarTn
controversy_summary: Was promoting a Counter-Strike gambling website to his audience and it was revealed that he owned the website. This caused a massive backlash in the community.

name: Jake Dufner
controversy_summary: He made a video in which he depicts being killed on camera. Some portion of his younger audience believed this since the content on his channel is presented as being real.

name: Manny Mua
controversy_summary: During his feud with Jeffree Star, he was called out by Gabriel Zamora for being a toxic presence.

name: Yovana Mendoza
controversy_summary: Yovana used to run a channel centered around a vegan lifestyle. However, a video of her eating fish was accidentally released on a friend's vlog.

name: Simply Kenna
controversy_summary: She was accused of stealing artwork and content from other creators and online sources.

name: Fie Laursen
controversy_summary: She released a video admitting to lying and creating a fake persona to stay relevant, and for money and fame.

name: Jay Station
controversy_summary: Used another YouTuber's death as clickbait to boost views on video

name: N&A Prod
controversy_summary: Used another YouTuber's death as clickbait to boost views on video

name: ProJared
controversy_summary: Allegations of adultery and being a child predator were initiated by his then wife Heidi

name: Sam Pepper
controversy_summary: Made a prank video where he grabbed strangers' butts. Soon after posting this, other allegations of sexual harrassment and assault surfaced. The controversy kept building for a year and a half at which point sam made his apology video.

name: Slazo
controversy_summary: Sexual abuse allegations were released by ex girlfriend and then more allegations were surfaced
